info.name: Inoreader
info.description: This style should be used with the "Minimal" theme. I'm using this on a Mac and I haven't tested it with other systems, nor have I used any browser other than chrome. It further cleans out the UI and it also replaces the logo with simple text. It resembles Google Reader and it is quite modest, but I hope it can help others like me.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated on Aug. 16, 2013: the #no_more_div layer is back so you can use the spacebar to skip to unread feeds again. The site's logo has been completely hidden and replaced by a bigger search box.

Updated on Oct. 21, 2013: new css overrides to keep up with site redesign.

Updated on Oct. 28, 2013: background color change in the top bar.

Updated on Nov. 25, 2013: all sorts of small fixes.

Updated on Jan 9, 2014: more fixes related to redesign.
